lst.name: sentence
lst.str: N. Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific said in its annual report that the price fall substantially cut exploration by foreign oil firms, which found it unprofitable to maintain investments in the region.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report said <Thai Shell Exploration and Production Co Ltd>, a unit of the <Royal Dutch/Shell Group> announced a 30 pct cut in exploration and production spending last year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: South Korea, the Philippines, India, Thailand and Pakistan were major beneficiaries, with Thailand and Pakistan respectively saving about 875 mln and 435 mln dlrs last year.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report said Shell Exploration and Production Co Ltd>, a unit of the <Royal Dutch/Shell Group> announced a 30 pct cut in exploration and production spending last year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: South Korea, the Philippines, India, Thailand and Pakistan were major beneficiaries, with Thailand and Pakistan respectively saving about 875 mln and 435 mln dlrs last year.
